message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business. I understand its worth to you is significant, and I'm willing to negotiate a fair price. I'm asking for $1,150,000, which leaves room for both of us to benefit from this transaction. This is a one-time opportunity, and I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations. Please let me know your decision.
